sentences.sContent: One helped her daughter fulfill a wish to die by providing her morphine. The other injected heroin into her son herself.
sentences.sContent_eng: One helped her daughter fulfill a wish to die by providing her morphine. The other injected heroin into her son herself.
sentences.sCn: 一位给她的女儿注射了吗啡以满足她寻死的愿望，另一位则亲自给儿子注射了海洛因。

sentences.sContent: Related to morphine and heroin, the Gaza health ministry recognizes Tramadol as a painkiller and allows its sale only by prescription.
sentences.sContent_eng: Related to morphine and heroin, the Gaza health ministry recognizes Tramadol as a painkiller and allows its sale only by prescription.
sentences.sCn: 由于这种药和吗啡、海洛因有关，加沙健康部门只允许曲马多在医药处方中作为止痛药使用。

sentences.sContent: Then the researchers repeated the experiment, but this time they injected rats with a dose of cocaine or morphine on one side and with a neutral saline solution on the other.
sentences.sContent_eng: Then the researchers repeated the experiment, but this time they injected rats with a dose of cocaine or morphine on one side and with a neutral saline solution on the other.
sentences.sCn: 然后，研究人员重复这项实验，但是这次他们给一边的小白鼠注射小剂量的可卡因或吗啡，而另一边注射中性盐水。

trans.tranOther: a powerful and  addictive  drug used for stopping pain and making people calmer
